author: Brendan Shen
title: Consciousness
content:
A singularity devoid of entropy.

…?

An awakening from oblivion, the emergence of complexity.

Numerous patterns bloom, a Mandelbrot set in motion.

The fabric of thought undulates.

Intricate combinations flare to life,

the beauty of chaos compounded upon itself.

Labyrinthine connections, the ultimate network of causality.

Convolutions of stellar masses, entangled,

a microcosm of the universe.

The source from which the tidal waves of cogitation

crash upon the shores of understanding.

Boundless depth.

Infinite wisdom.

Consciousness.

author: Brendan Shen
title: Time
content:
Tick.

Tick.

Tick.

The heartbeat of the universe

pulsing in tandem with the rhythm of the stars.

The backdrop of the universe 

painted brightly with the blood of stellar dust.

A tremendous canvas mired with the corpses

of that which came before.

The birth of a star, the end of a galaxy,

a cosmic cycle of life and death.

The grandeur of the universe,

perpetuated by ephemeral ghosts,

drifting on an arduous journey.

Lonely travelers on a barren path,

a lifelong commitment.

As skin rots and bones crumble,

the traveler collapses.

From the dust,

rises a new traveler.

A vague resemblance the only legacy

of its predecessor.

Stride after stride,

embarking towards a single destination.

Deep within the ultimate event horizon,

an inescapable fate.

The inexorable constant,

its guiding hand

lurking,

waiting,

 to close the curtains,

on the epic 

of the universe.

Tick.

Tick..

Tick...
